# isHorizontallyResizable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that controls whether the receiver changes its width to fit the width of its text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHorizontallyResizable: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `flag` is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] it does; if `flag` is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] it doesn’t

## Constraining size

- **maxSize**: The receiver’s maximum size.
- **minSize**: The receiver’s minimum size.
- **isVerticallyResizable**: A Boolean that controls whether the receiver changes its height to fit the height of its text.
- **sizeToFit()**: Resizes the receiver to fit its text.
